pages.text: $(2)Tinkers' Construct$() is one of the core mods in this modpack, and there's tons of custom materials and traits. To make progress in TConstruct, make a $(2)Blank Cast$() first, and the quest will reward you with enough stuff to begin with. For more details, view $(9)Material and You$() in your Omnipedia.

$(c)$(l)Notes: $()$(br2)$(li)Don't try to make cement as both of Seared Brick and Scorched Brick's recipes have been changed.$(li) Use $(9)Sharpening Kits $()and $(2)Polishing Kits$() to repair tools and armors, do not repair with ingots. $(li)Steel can only be obtained from high oven, please look for molten steel in JEI for recipe. $(li)Some tool types are locked behind game stages and will prompt the player to get more progression. Search for blueprint in JEI for how to unlock these tools.
